meanings.sent1: I found fourpennies on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: She saved up fourpennies to buy a candy bar.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of fourpennies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as fourpennies in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of fourpennies jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A small amount of money equal to four pennies.
meanings.sent1: He only had fourpennies left after buying the toy.
meanings.sent2: She gave him fourpennies for his birthday.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel buried fourpennies in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were worth more than fourpennies.
meanings.sent5: The value of friendship is priceless, even fourpennies can't compare.
